title: New GED Coming

contentencoded:
In January of 2014, the GED exam is going digital, and it’s going to be harder to pass. This adult basic education instructors worried – what will happen to current students who need the credential in order to move up the economic ladder?


Guest: Kristine Wehrkamp, Supervisor at Ronald M. Hubbs Center for Lifelong Learning in St. Paul, Minn.


More on Laurie Stern’s report, “Re-Writing the GED test” (originally aired on WBEZ as part of the Front & Center project, June 4, 2012).
